violations.description: Ensure the contrast between foreground and background colors meets WCAG 2 AA minimum contrast ratio thresholds

nodes.html: <input title="Enter the terms you wish to search for." type="text" id="edit-search-block-form--2" name="search_block_form" value="" size="15" maxlength="128" class="form-text">
nodes.failureSummary:
Fix any of the following:
  Element has insufficient color contrast of 4.25 (foreground color: #77725f, background color: #f5f0ea, font size: 9.0pt (12px), font weight: normal). Expected contrast ratio of 4.5:1

Fix any of the following:
  Element has insufficient color contrast of 3.65 (foreground color: #4f87be, background color: #1c2b52, font size: 12.0pt (16px), font weight: normal). Expected contrast ratio of 4.5:1
